stages.description: You take a deep breath and gather arcane energy into yourself. With the power of magic, this contest will be all too easy.
You summon your magic and prepare to put on a show. This is one they won't forget!
You smirk broadly as you face your opponent. Nobody can withstand your combination of showy tricks and real magic.
You swagger and gesture contemptuously at your opponent. You'll quickly have them transformed with your stunning power.
You take a few seconds to size up your opponent. This one is no match for your magic and skills
Crap! The attack ruined your best coat and hat! This won't impede your magic at all, though. You focus and prepare a counterattack.
The attack leaves you wearing just your leotard. Irritated, you prepare a potent magical counteroffensive.
The attack catches you off-guard and ruins most of your clothes. You're not going down without a fierce fight, though.
The attack leaves you more exposed then you'd like to be, but you don't get mad, you get even. You prepare for two fists of magical revenge.
Your magical outfit is ruined; luckily you didn't actually need it to do magic. You prepare to strike back!
Damn. Your legs are turning to plastic! You'll be able to change them back with magic, but you'll need some quiet time to do it, so you'll need to win!
You raise your hands to protect yourself, but too late. You're struck by an attack that turns your legs to plastic!
Despite your efforts to misdirect your opponent, you're caught off guard. An attack lands on you which begins transforming you to plastic!
You dodge and weave, but an attack strikes you anyway. It starts turning your legs to plastic!
You strike a defiant pose, but your opponent seizes the opportunity to land a transforming attack. You're turning into plastic!
Your legs and torso are entirely transformed to plastic. You channel all your strength into your magic for one last volley.
You shout in frustration as almost all of your body becomes plastic. You ready yourself for a last, desperate spell.
You're almost defeated, transformed to plastic! The magic in your hands swells and keeps you alive, ready for one more try.
You can't lose! You shouldn't be a mannequin! You have a tiny bit more fight left in you.
You feel the plastic transformation overwhelming you. You reach out desperately for one more attempt to win.
You're not a magician any more. You are just a mannequin, elegantly displaying a skimpy magician outfit.
You lose! You've been transformed into a mannequin, frozen in place and completely helpless.
The transformation catches you at an awkward time--but it doesn't matter any more. You're now just an awkwardly posed mannequin.
'No!' You cry out, but to no avail. The transformation quickly overwhelms you, and you are now just a mannequin, displaying a sexy magician's outfit.
You feel yourself transforming faster and faster. Subconsciously, you feel your smooth transformed skin--and try to pull back, but it's too late. You've been completely transformed into a mannequin.
